name: Ghostly Matter
description: Ghostly Matter is a metroidvania with elements borrowed from graphic adventures. The year is 1986. A professor obsessed with the paranormal, an old friend who disappeared mysteriously. Time to arm yourself with the best anti-ghost technology and set off in search of the truth.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
